alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 3:32AM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 35 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area and Central Willamette Valley. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts are expected to peak Monday night into early Tuesday morning with the arrival of a cold- frontal boundary.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area
